page.title: 06CRIME RATES
page.content: I decided to look at crime both in Ladywood and the City Centre.I enquired at Ladywood police station.An officer told me the most common crime was car thefts and thefts from cars mainly from a local supermarket car park.I then enquired at Steel House Lane police station and an officer there told me 9,441 crimes were committed last year. These crimes were 2 manslaughters, 4 murders 106 serious wounds,551 less serious wounds.1772 burglaries,150 thefts from shops,510 robberies,606 thefts from persons,218 thefts of bicycles,3000 thefts of vehicles. The police division detected 35.5% of crimes last year and have 484 policemen patrolling the streets a week. by Peter Walker
